          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Szirti borkóró</string>
            <string language="en-US">Fetid meadowrue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fetid meadowrue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Meadowrue fétide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meadowrue fetid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Meadowrue fetido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Fetid meadowrue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Meadowrue fétido</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A szirti borkórónak (Thalictrum foetidum) egyetlen állománya él az Aggteleki Nemzeti Park területén</string>
            <string language="en-US">Only one stock of the fetid meadow-rue (Thalictrum foetidum) lives in the area of the National Park of Aggtelek</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">növénytan</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">jellegzetes faj</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nur ein Vorrat an fetid Wiese-Rue (Thalictrum 
foetidum) lebt im Bereich des Nationalparks von Aggtelek</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Seulement une actions de la pré-rue fétide 
(foetidum de Thalictrum) vivent dans la zone du parc national 
d'Aggtelek</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Somente um estoque do prado-meadow-rue fetid 
(foetidum de Thalictrum) vive na área do parque nacional de Aggtelek</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soltanto un'azione della prato-ruta fetida 
(foetidum di Thalictrum) vive nella zona del parco nazionale di 
Aggtelek</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόνο ένα απόθεμα των fetid ζωών λιβάδι-rue 
(foetidum Thalictrum) στον τομέα του εθνικού πάρκου 
Aggtelek</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Solamente una acción del prado-meadow-rue 
fétido (foetidum de Thalictrum) vive en el área del parque nacional 
de Aggtelek</string>
          </description>
